archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Physical Infrastructure Shortfall Identification
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Identify Shortfalls in Physical Infrastructure - Identify shortfalls in infrastructure, such as building capacity, which may not be visible to central tactical planning users. This requires large amounts of data, potentially leading to a very expensive system solution. However, such systems are used locally for construction projects, so the system does not require a live view of the complete network. It is only necessary to administer a physical planning solution centrally to ensure data consistency; the data itself may be distributed to individual locations
